title: Bit Unfair
body:
I am a firm believer in our almighty savior Teemo, blessings be upon him. Now the lord himself has many a skin but alas, my "shop" only gives me one skin of our lord (Happy Elf Teemo) and it was the 30% off skin. I shed many a tear upon the discovery of this revelation. It is my thought that Riot decided that my Teemo Only Account (only have teemo as champ on it) did not deserve more skins of our lord and savior. It is my thought that Riot did not wish to indulge my Teemo fetish! Shame on thee, Riot!


-So sayeth I, first disciple of the cult of the Teemo

replies.body: A true acolyte of the Teemo would buy each and every skin full price to send Rito a firm message that more ought to be constructed in his good name.

Without an RP sacrifice in the form of Teemo Skins surely this will bring the longest winter of all time!

THE END IS NIGH!
